recipe.ingredients: - plain Greek yogurt: 2 cups - mixed nuts (chopped, unsalted): 1/2 cup - honey: 2 tablespoons - fresh berries (such as blueberries or strawberries): 1/2 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Layer Ingredients: In serving glasses or bowls, start with a layer of Greek yogurt. 2. Add Nuts: Sprinkle a layer of chopped mixed nuts over the yogurt. 3. Drizzle Honey: Drizzle some honey over the nuts. 4. Add Berries: Top with a layer of fresh berries. 5. Repeat Layers: Repeat the layering process until all ingredients are used. 6. Serve Immediately: Serve the parfait immediately or chill for up to an hour before serving to deepen the flavors.
